      • handleIntents

        private void handleIntents()
        Handles the intents received from other activites.

      • initLocation

        private void initLocation()
        Initializes the location components, such as the MyLocationOverlay and MapController. When MyLocationOverlay gets the users location, it will move and zoom in to that point.

      • initMapView

        private void initMapView()
        Initializes the MapView, the mapController and adds the relevant overlays (MyLocationOverlay and MyItemizedOverlay)

      • populateMapWithQuestions

        private void populateMapWithQuestions()
        Places a question on the MapView. This method should only be used if the user is walking a course.

      • placeQuestion

        private void placeQuestion()
        Places a question on the map, this method should only be used if the user is setting a course.

      • onTap

        public void onTap(int index)
        Dialog for when the user taps on a map marker. Displays different dialogs depending on the mode. For example we don't want the user to answer a question that has been placed. This method is called from the itemizedoverlay method in MyItemizedOverlay.
        Parameters:
        index -
